data.eml:eml: The genus Sciara Meigen (Diptera, Sciaridae) in New Caledonia, with the description of two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vilkamaa, Pekka, Hippa, Heikki, Mohrig, Werner (2015): The genus Sciara Meigen (Diptera, Sciaridae) in New Caledonia, with the description of two new species. Zootaxa 3974 (4): 589-594, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3974.4.10
